author: lgo
msg: Fix issue #2545: switch and svn_client_switch() should support peg revisions.
(svn_client__switch_internal): add peg_revision parameter. Use call to
svn_client__ra_session_from_path to open a ra_session to the right url,
taking the peg revision into account.
(svn_client_switch2): add peg_revision parameter, pass it to
(svn_client_switch): use unspecified peg revision in call to
(switch_external): use peg_revision in call to svn_client__switch_internal.
(svn_cl__switch): parse the peg revision from the switch url and use it in

author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Expose arbitrary revprop retrieval through the logMessages()
interface.  This brings the interface back up-to-date with
jobjectArray of revprops to a vector of strings.
(logMessages): Take a vector of revprops, and convert it to an apr_array.
(logMessages): Update interface to take a revprops array, update wrappers.
